title: Bayesian Statistics
description: Rigorous introduction to the theory of Beysian Statistical Inference. Bayesian estimation and testing. Conjugate priors. Noninformative priors. Bayesian computation. Bayesian networks and Bayesian signal processing. Various engineering applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: ISYE 6412 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
